name: VOID: Explore the Emptiness
description:
In a galaxy, pretty far away...
A Starsailor is tasked to investigate an unusual planet ukufa. Little did they know, the planet was much more unusual than they had prepared for.
The spaceship encountered a huge geomagnetic storm, causing it to malfunction and to crash right on the ukufa.
Play as the Starsailor, an astronaut deployed by the I.S.A, International Space Association. The Starsailor has to travel around ukufa to collect the scattered spaceship parts and rebuild the broken spaceship.

VOID is a game made by six passionate game development students from Universitas Indonesia. It is made as a final project for the game development course.

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Movement
E - Action
